name: Kill 1 Goblins
info: Goblins have been ruining all my walks outside town. I will pay to have some of them taken out.

name: Find a Death Scroll
info: I am in desperate need of a Death Scroll. I fancy a girl, but her father has forbade our union.

name: Kill a Vicious Slime
info: A Vicious Slime has destroyed all my crops. Take it out and I will reward you handsomely.

name: Kill 1 Slimes
info: Slimes are disgusting! Will pay for removing some of these vile creatures from our land.

name: Find a Superior Health Potion
info: My husband is going off to war soon. I need a Superior Health Potion to make sure he comes back to me.

name: Kill a Demon
info: A Demon has torn our town apart. Kill it and you will be rewarded handsomely.
